Translations.Text: bhuprsthata yi ache sakalo dhbansasila
arau abinasbara kerala tomara pratipalakara ceharaa, yijana mahimamaya, mahanubhara
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
akasamandala arau prthiraita yisakala ache, sakalorae te'omra ocarata praarthi, te'om pratito muhurttate gurautbapurna kamata niyojita
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
he manara arau jina! Ami anatipalame tomalokara (hicapa-nikaca grahanara) prati manonibesa karaima
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
he jina arau manara sampradaya! Akasamandala arau prthiraira sima yadi tomaloke atikrama karaiba paraa tente atikrama karaa, kintu tomaloke (allahara) saktibihina atikrama karaiba noraaraiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tomaloka ubhayara prati praerana karaa ha’ba agnisikha arau dhumrapunja, tetiya tomaloke pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
yidina akasa bidirna ha’ba se'idina i tejabarna golapara darae rana chalara raupa dharana karaiba
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
gatike se'idina manuhako tara aparaadha samparke sodha naha’ba arau jinako nahaya
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
aparaadhisakalara paraicaya poraa yaba sihamtara laksanara dbaraa, tara pichata sihamtara agaculi arau bharaita dharai tani niya ha’ba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yaka aparaadhisakale asbikara karaichila
Sihamta jahannamara ju'i arau utala panira majata ghurai thakiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
